thread.section_title: Prince's Square Apartments - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Nice Environment
thread.title_full: Nice Environment - Review of Prince's Square Apartments, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Adebiyi R
title: Nice Environment
text:
Absolutely Cheap!!
Stayed in this apartment a couple of times.
A bit of renovation needed to enhance the standard to a more contemporary setting.
The reception should be enhanced with sofa, a bottle of water should be available at the lobby.
Nevertheless, I would stay here again.
Biyi Modile
